title: Biden Stimulus Plan, SC Rep. Nancy Mace
itunes:title: Biden Stimulus Plan, SC Rep. Nancy Mace
description:
Guests: Laura Davison, Bloomberg Tax and Congress reporter, Jeanne Sheehan, Iona College Professor, and Bloomberg politics contributor, Adam Goodman, Republican media strategist, columnist and partner at Ballard Partners in Washington, and Rep. Nancy Mace, a Republican representing South Carolina's First Congressional District.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
